alert.note: Alert for Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 7:17AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Randolph County through 800 AM EST... At 717 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Carolina Zoo, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Asheboro, Randleman, North Carolina Zoo, Seagrove, Liberty, Ramseur, Franklinville, Staley, Randleman Regional Reservior Marina and Coleridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for central North Carolina.
